content.description:
"XRock Rules" is a 19 meter 5.9 protected by eight bolts plus an anchor. It is right of

Sweet Sandstone

. Belay at bottom of a chockstone in a gully. Scramble up the chockstone to the first bolt. Make a rising traverse to steepening ground and a roof.
content.location:
This is right of

Sweet Sandstone

.

content.description: This has technical slabbing on flaky crimps and sideclings.
content.protection:
Originially this had 5 bolts.

Now it has 8 bolts with a lowering anchor, bring one hand-sized cam. T

he route and stances have changed due to changing rock. This has been re-arranged/ updated with more and better bolts and a convenient lowering anchor by the FA party.
content.location: This is the only bolted route on the wall. You can't miss it.

content.description:
Start up the seam for

Devastation Gully

, but move right up a 5.8 slab and roof.
content.protection: Offset nuts or tricams down low and cams at the roof.
content.location:
Do the same start as

Devastation

, and move right after the seam.

content.description: Start in a seam with fingerlocks in pin scars. Move left onto an easy slab and up to an offwidth corner to the bolts.
content.protection: Offset nuts or tricams down low to large cams in the corner.
content.location: This is the furthest left route on the wall. Look for the obvious, offwidth corner up high.
